Articles.Content:
This one took a little less time than the Dragon, and so I haven't bothered to build a Soyuz launcher or provide a download. If there's enough demand for either, I'll set my mind to it! In the meantime, take a peek:

![mAjPcDv.png](http://i.imgur.com/mAjPcDv.png)

Soyuz with Dragon:

![yoRWgph.png](http://i.imgur.com/yoRWgph.png)

![MONMawU.png](http://i.imgur.com/MONMawU.png)

Leave some rep if you enjoyed, and I'm always open to feedback! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Wow! This is really cool. I would leave some rep, but I have to spread it around before. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Nothin' wrong with that. Also- I need ideas on what to do next, so if anyone has suggestions...
This is amazing, you just keep on making crafts and building tricks. I have to spread some rep around, too.

> 
> Wow! This is really cool. I would leave some rep, but I have to spread it around before.

> 
> This is amazing, you just keep on making crafts and building tricks. I have to spread some rep around, too.

You two are my biggest fans, then! Kidding, love everyone whether they give rep or not.

Wow. This is mind-blowing. Great work on aesthetics! Are you going to build a launcher for it?

Repped!

No offence but with the box like Orbital module it kinda looks like the Shenzhou, a Chinese spacecraft in development. Looks good though! Have some rep

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T06:56:02Z" title="04/12/2015 06:56  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by Jumpyyoza**

"You cannot give Reputation to the same post twice"

Awwwwww.....
